name: @ckb-lumos/base
description: Base data structures and utilities used in lumos
author: Xuejie Xiao <xxuejie@gmail.com>

scripts.regenerate-schema: mkdir -p tmp && curl -L https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nervosnetwork/ckb/v0.100.0/util/types/schemas/blockchain.mol -o tmp/blockchain.mol && moleculec --language - --schema-file tmp/blockchain.mol --format json > tmp/core.json && moleculec-es -hasBigInt -inputFile tmp/core.json -outputFile tmp/core.esm.js -generateTypeScriptDefinition && rollup -f umd -i tmp/core.esm.js -o lib/core.js --name CKBCore && cp tmp/core.esm.d.ts lib/core.d.ts && rm -rf tmp
